title: Account transfer
body:
Good day, Riot.

I am looking to transfer servers from OCE to NA, but on the account page, (where I can buy the servers I want to change into) there's only the name change available. Is there a special way to transfer servers?

Hoping for a response soon. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hi

Transfers are disabled at the moment, due to the emotes release in OCE.  You can read more about it in our [announcement post](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/f6bvYNQx-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st).

Until Oct 10th though, you can contact Player Support and they can help you by doing a manual transfer.

Cheers
Mindstar
